history.proof: intros a b H1 H2. qsimpl use: Z. qsimpl use: Z,Z_div_ge0. qsimpl use: Z,Z_div_ge0,Z_div_lt. srun best use: Z.ge_le, Z.compare_nlt_iff, Z.square_lt_mono_nonneg.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : Z H1 : a >= 0 H0 : (a ?= b) = Lt Unable to unify "(?M2118 / ?M2119 ?= 0) = Lt -> False" with "(a * a ?= b * b) = Lt".
In environment H : forall a b : Z, b > 0 -> a >= 0 -> a / b >= 0 a, b : Z H1 : a >= 0 H0 : (a ?= b) = Lt Unable to unify "(?M2366 / ?M2367 ?= ?M2366) = Lt" with "(a * a ?= b * b) = Lt".

original: intros a b H1 H2. apply Z.mul_lt_mono_pos_l. - apply Z_div_ge0; auto. - apply Z_div_lt; auto.
